Table of Contents

Class PassThroughInputManager

Namespace
osu.Framework.Input
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

An InputManager with an ability to use parent InputManager's input.

public class PassThroughInputManager : CustomInputManager, IDependencyInjectionCandidate, IDisposable, IContainerEnumerable<Drawable>, IContainerCollection<Drawable>, IContainer, ICollection<Drawable>, IReadOnlyList<Drawable>, IReadOnlyCollection<Drawable>, IEnumerable<Drawable>, IEnumerable, IInputStateChangeHandler, IFocusManager, IRequireHighFrequencyMousePosition, IDrawable, ITransformable, ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator, ISourceGeneratedLongRunningLoadCache, ISourceGeneratedHandleInputCache

Remarks

There are two modes of operation for this class: When UseParentInput is false, this input manager gets inputs only from own input handlers. When UseParentInput is true, this input manager ignore any local input handlers and gets inputs from the parent (its ancestor in the scene graph) InputManager in the following way: For mouse input, this only considers input that is passed as events such as MouseDownEvent. For keyboard and other inputs, this input manager try to reflect parent InputManager's InputState closely as possible. Thus, when this is attached to the scene graph initially and when UseParentInput becomes true, multiple events may fire to synchronise the local InputState with the parent's.

Properties

HandleHoverEvents

Whether this input manager is in a state it should handle hover events. This could for instance be set to false when the window/target does not have input focus.

public override bool HandleHoverEvents { get; }

Property Value

bool

UseParentInput

If there's an InputManager above us, decide whether we should use their available state.

public virtual bool UseParentInput { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Handle a UI event.

protected override bool Handle(UIEvent e)

Parameters

e UIEvent

The event to be handled.

Returns

bool

If the event supports blocking, returning true will make the event to not propagating further.

LoadComplete()

Invoked after this Drawable has finished loading.

protected override void LoadComplete()

Remarks

This method is invoked on the update thread inside this Drawable's UpdateSubTree().

RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry)

Invoked to register dependency activation functions for this object.

public override void RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry registry)

Parameters

registry IDependencyActivatorRegistry

The IDependencyActivatorRegistry to register activation functions with.

Update()

Performs a once-per-frame update specific to this Drawable. A more elegant alternative to OnUpdate when deriving from Drawable. Note, that this method is always called before Drawables further down the scene graph are updated.

protected override void Update()
